name: LONER
description:
This is a story about one student Aline who sincerely believes and dreams to prove everyone - aliens exist. But all that she gets is insults of her mates that don’t take her seriously.

Loner - is a classic 2D quest game with opened world where the main aim is doing mini quests and small puzzles. Chat to the characters, seek different clues, cashes. They will help you to do your mission. Step by step you will unravel a slot ball. Finally you might find evidences that aliens exist. Go ahead to unforgettable adventures!
